name: rick n morty shimeji
description:
SOMETHING I DID FOR FUN. SOME NOTES TO GET YOU STARTED:

  • theres a lot of documentation on how to get shimejis running if they don't work, if you need help setting them up. just unzip the file and run the .jar  
  • most shimejis randomly multiply until your screen is filled with like 50 of them. i changed frequency to 0 in behavior.xml because i didn't want them slowing down my computer (but you can still create doubles by right clicking a shimeji and choosing 'split into two' or 'pull up shimeji'
  • 'settings > choose interactive windows' to choose which windows they can climb up on etc.
